pageContext.claim: “We've you've increased -- not just stock market, I'm talking our country. Our economy is bigger. It's stronger. And I believe if my opponent got in, you would have had a tremendous slide.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence this is the case. The stock market boomed under Barack Obama -- more than under Trump -- and job growth under Trump in the first two years was little different than Obama's last two years.
